oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate Park with Horse-and-Carriage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Confederate Park, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image, with horse-and-carriage in left lower-front of image.

“Miss Irene Brignardello -- 66 Madison Ave [line drawn through address] -- Memphis, -- Tenn. -- Box 1008 -- Hello Miss Irene. How -- are you -- Well good. -- bye -- Aleine -- Dear Miss Irene -- We are having a -- fine time. We go to a creek -- every day to wade -- It is nobody here -- to play with. Well I -- will close with lots -- of love & kisses -- From, -- Genevieve”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Confederate Park; parks; Mississippi River; rivers; downtown; riverfront;
